org.gearvrf

Class GVRBone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrettyPrint

    public final class GVRBone
extends GVRComponent
implements PrettyPrint
    A single bone of a mesh.

    A bone has a name by which it can be found in the frame hierarchy and by which it can be addressed by animations. In addition it has a number of influences on vertices.

    This class is designed to be mutable, i.e., the returned collections are writable and may be modified.

    Instantaneous pose of the bone during animation is not part of this class, but in GVRSkeleton. This allows multiple instances of the same mesh and bones.

      • getFinalTransformMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getFinalTransformMatrix()
        Gets the final transform of the bone.
        Returns:
        the 4x4 matrix representing the final transform of the bone during animation, which comprises bind pose and skeletal transform at the current time of the animation.

      • getOffsetMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getOffsetMatrix()
        Returns the offset matrix.

        The offset matrix is a 4x4 matrix that transforms from mesh space to bone space in bind pose.

        This method is part of the wrapped API (see AiWrapperProvider for details on wrappers).

        Returns:
        the offset matrix
